attributes.action: Take immediate steps to halt the decline of the national heritage fleet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst much money is available for the preservation and conservation of old buildings and 'monuments' there is none available for the maintenance of the extensive and diverse UK heritage fleet of traditional vessels. Many of these vessels are run by charities or voluntary organisations in order to provide water based activities for young people (of all abilities).  Please take action now to halt this decline thus ensuring that future generations get to enjoy these irreplaceable vessels.
